relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="7" value="拒绝论证" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="6" vertex="1" connectable="0"><mxGeometry x="-0.2488" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint as="offset"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="11" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" connectable="0" parent="11"><mxGeometry x="0.5151" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint as="offset"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="2" value="命题" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="30" y="250" width="70" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="4" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;entryX=0.386;entryY=0.05;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="3" target="2" edge="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="3" value="陈述句" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="-40" y="60" width="70" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="5" value="断言" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;entryX=0.743;entryY=-0.05;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="8" target="2" edge="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="8" value="主题" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="150" y="60" width="70" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="10" value="问题" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="320" y="150" width="70" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="13" value="工具" style="swimlane;startSize=23;" height="270" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="19" value="人的成熟" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="14"><mxGeometry x="40" y="60" width="80" height="40" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
